name: GLOBL JAM 2025
description:
It takes more than talent-it’s the unseen sacrifices, the sweat that never stops, the moments when walking away would be easier. But the ones who refuse to back down? They rise, and own the game.
‍
This summer, the future of basketball takes center stage as GLOBL JAM returns to Canada. The best Under-23 men’s and women’s teams on the planet go head-to-head in a relentless 5-on-5 battle with every moment broadcast nationwide on Sportsnet.
‍
Watch Team Canada’s next NBA and WNBA stars rise on home soil.
This is more than a tournament, it’s a proving ground. The grind before the glory.
